channel.title: Pk-Town
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img396.imageshack.us/img396/6752/pktownvb9.png[/img][/URL]
The story: well, the name pk-town comes from my old server when i first started out coding, it was a barely edited project czar base, although not very popular i liked it because it was easy to code and taught me a lot of what i know today. Now i am back and better than ever and am working on Pk-Town v2 which will hopefully be a big hit, i am putting a ton of work into this and think the end result will be a fun server to play and pk on, i am aiming to make it one of the top pk servers out there (will include skills such as herblore, fishing , cooking and mining also)
this thread will be updated with new features i add to my server, which will be out very soon full autocast: 100% done full king black dragon, barrows and kalphite queen with correct emotes etc : 100% done full rs wilderness with exact rs lvls :30 % done (due to my crappy wilderness method) every single rs item and its exact bonus : 100% done (thanks jason <3) full rs non-massing specials, 100% done (removed d baxe and d mace special because no one every uses and they create more space taken up in my client) added npc's with dialogue, and teleportation: 10% done (still have a ton more to do) full npc\player following+ retreating , along with npc freezing : 100% done npc drops to my liking: 30% done (using runehq.com as a tool to make correct rs drops) fixed bugs from winterlove: 90% done (need to fix a minor hp bug) full mining, wcing,firemaking,fishing and cooking: 100% done handled 75 % of the server : 100% done (handled eating potting, all skills, gfx , commands , specs and tons more) full fight caves with a number of waves: 50% done
percent of server finished : 65%
pic: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/1431/pktownmcr5.png[/img][/URL]
i was recently banned from youtube (iped) (sucks i know) :( here is a vid uploaded onto runetube http://www.runetube.biz/play.php?vid=142
my msn is j30sj3w3ls@hotmail.com if you have a question or just want someone to talk to, im bored all day and like to talk to people lol :\

i said that i bought them off sean in the first place to get you off my ass and then u start to say i buy my whole server, u are pathetic and will burn in hell one day, send me a postcard, i hear the weathers nice[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2008, 05:13:40 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Ultimacool, post:42, topic:195794”][quote author=pk-town link=topic=260335.msg2159040#msg2159040 date=1207297258]

[/quote]

Lescape is one of the better people on this forum,Hes actually been here WAY longer then you.[/quote]
i know i havent been here long, these forums are for noobs and leechers, if u get 200 rep on here it means nothing, r00n server is the real forum, this is a joke and anyone who takes part in it is a joke, do not say i take part in it, this is my first topic[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2008, 05:14:25 AM[/size][hr]and every time i post something here i get flamed, just goes to show how jealous some noobs can be, and lescape jacks off over fight caves ROFL

item.title: Pk-Town
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Joe says: and why did u post that i bought it in the first place. thats total bullshit after i spent a week and a half working on it
So you're saying...you spent a week and a half on barrows, working npcs and some shops, yet you're too lazy to program fight caves? I also know for a fact that sean had barrows, just like the one you're bosting, and fight caves. You earlier said you bought them, and now you deny it. Every other thing you say contradicts yourself. "I bought them from my mate, sean" *gets flames for trying to take all the credit* "roflroflroflf wtf u nub i kill u who the hell is sir pk poon roflroflroflrof lmaolmaolmao"

You should try telling the truth once in a while, it requires less memorization.

Read full topic
